
Want to use greenbride in two minutes? Fill in the form below and hit _Generate Commands_. 
You will be presented with *seven commands* that you can paste in your command line.


<wiki:gadget url="http://greenbridge.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/igadget.xml"  width="640" height="600"  />

Once the commands run, have a look around the two generated maven projects. 
* Open stories.html in the first mvn project with your web browser. This is the story wiki.   
* Open AppTest.java in the second mvn project. This is an example of annotating your junit tests.
